content.notes: Content not refactored in Phase 1; original preserved under payload.

layout_template.notes: Layout based on the Africa_ADayInTheLife.jpg draft (layout only; character content populated from new_prompts.xlsx + South America.docx).

header.notes: Handwritten/script title at top-left over a muted world-map background.

grid.notes: Each character row = left info panel + 6 image cards. Each card has a square photo above a short caption.

characters.name: Kai

label.headline: Kai
label.subhead: A Yanomami Boy in Brazilâ€™s Amazon Rainforest
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Kai is a 9-year-old Yanomami boy living in the Amazon rainforest in Brazil. The Yanomami people have a traditional, semi-nomadic lifestyle strongly tied to the rainforest.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: Morning mist cools my skin. I clutch my satchel and feel the forest invite me in.

scenes.caption_first_person: Leaves brush my shoulders. I listen for clues from chatter monkeys and hidden frogs.

scenes.caption_first_person: My heartbeat thuds when I spot the plant. I pluck its leaves and thank the forest aloud.

image.alt_text: Kai: Small clearing at a buttress root (Brazil).

scenes.caption_first_person: I lay the herb in Grandfatherâ€™s hands. Warm smiles flicker brighter than the flames.

scenes.caption_first_person: I spin with friends under the stars. The forest drums inside my chest.

characters.name: Marisol

label.headline: Marisol
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Marisol is a 30-year-old chef living in Lima, Peru. Peruvian culture is famous for its diverse and rich cuisine, influenced by indigenous, Spanish, African, and Asian cuisines.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: I lift a red pepper and inhale its spice. My recipe ideas bloom like sunrise colors.

scenes.caption_first_person: I stir the bubbling stew. The scent reminds me of Abuelaâ€™s stories and steady hands.

scenes.caption_first_person: Plates empty fast. Each satisfied sigh feeds my spirit more than my own meals.

scenes.caption_first_person: I sit on a stone bench and taste ideas in my mind. Music guides every ingredient.

characters.bio_short: Juan Carlos is a 16-year-old musician living in MedellÃ­n, Colombia. Colombian culture is rich with music, dance, and festivals, reflecting Indigenous, African, and Spanish influences.

scenes.caption_first_person: Sea air cools my fingers on the strings. I greet the day with a slow melody.
